title: Our Boss, Rod Phillips Co-Hosts And Explains How Radio Works  + Garth Brooks Talks About His First Artist Paycheck + Bobby Reviews 'Love Is Blind' On Netflix
itunes:title: Our Boss, Rod Phillips Co-Hosts And Explains How Radio Works  + Garth Brooks Talks About His First Artist Paycheck + Bobby Reviews 'Love Is Blind' On Netflix
description:
iHeart Country EVP, Rod Phillips was our guest co-host today. He gave some serious insight into radio and how it all works. Garth Brooks stops by the studio to talk about his biggest career moments and answers Bobby's ‘hot take’ questions. Plus, Bobby reviewed two episodes of 'Love is Blind' on Netflix.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
